headline: Justin Trudeau seeks to repeat 2015 surge as Canada braces for election
trailText: The prime minister is likely to call a vote for next month in which the environment, populism and Trump are all expected to feature

headline: Canada: Trudeau accuses China of using 'arbitrary detentions' for political ends
trailText: Canadian prime minister sharpens criticism of Beijing and says: ‘This is not acceptable behaviour in the international community’

headline: Justin Trudeau fires starting gun for Canada's general election
trailText: Justin Trudeau to request dissolution of parliament and ‘Divisions have never been starker’ before 21 October polling day

headline: Justin Trudeau brownface: Canada PM apologises after image emerges
trailText: Canadian prime minister says he deeply regrets image from 2001 party, which emerges weeks out from election

headline: How will Justin Trudeau's blackface photos affect Canada's election?
trailText: Incident has landed the prime minister in hot water as his Liberal party fights to secure another term in a tightly contested election

headline: Trudeau says he can't recall how many times he wore blackface makeup
trailText: Footage emerges of third instance of Canadian prime minister in blackface, with one month to go before election

headline: Justin Trudeau's brownface scandal is bad. But voting him out isn't the solution
trailText: Let’s make sure that this incident forces us to examine not just Trudeau but also Canada and its racism

headline: Justin Trudeau’s blackface can’t be wiped away
trailText: Letters: The blackface issue is so powerful because it reveals white people’s almost total failure to appreciate the ongoing violence of racism, writes Rod Earle, while Pamela Jane Smith believes the revelations about the Canadian PM are politically motivated

headline: Trudeau tries to shift focus from brownface images to gun control
trailText: Canadian PM unveils pledge to restrict handguns on re-election campaign trail in Toronto

headline: Justin Trudeau – not so much racist as slight and ineffectual
trailText: The blackface row has exposed the failings of the Canadian prime minister

headline: David Lammy blames Trudeau's blackface outfit on 'racist tropes'
trailText: Labour MP says Canadian PM’s scandal reveals ‘even liberal leaders’ succumb to racism

headline: Canada's Green party sees election opportunity as climate fears rise
trailText: Party’s focus on environmental crisis has resonated with voters across the political spectrum ahead of federal election

headline: Trudeau’s blackface photos are awful – but then so are many of his policies
trailText: The Canadian prime minister is no monster, but he has spent years basking in a progressive image he doesn’t deserve, says Arwa Mahdawi

headline: Gentrification under Trudeau's nose: how his electoral district is struggling with evictions
trailText: Parc-Ex, one of Canada’s poorest areas and part of Justin Trudeau’s riding, has just welcomed a new University of Montreal campus that aims to position the city at the edge of AI research – but residents say there’s a huge cost

headline: Greta Thunberg meets Justin Trudeau amid climate strikes: 'He is not doing enough'
trailText: Activist has private meeting with Canadian prime minister, who later says he ‘agrees with her completely’

headline: How Canada’s far right is using anti-Muslim propaganda to target Trudeau
trailText: Anti-Trudeau conspiracies are being disseminated in earnest ahead of the general election, echoing US ‘birthers’, who alleged Obama was ineligible for office or was secretly a Muslim

headline: Trudeau appeal could block billions in compensation to Indigenous children
trailText: Government to appeal ruling that found youth were ‘wilfully and recklessly harmed’ under welfare system

headline: Canada leaders' debate: tarnished Trudeau puts climate crisis at heart of election
trailText: PM immediately targeted over blackface scandal but says choice is about two parties with ‘very different views’ on global heating

headline: Canada: why Doug Ford is kryptonite for Conservatives' election hopes
trailText: Ontario premier, whose stock as an electoral asset has plummeted as the party struggles to build momentum outside their base, has been compared to Trump

headline: Scandal on all sides as Canada  heads for ‘election of discontent’
trailText: Young voters sense a gulf between them and politicians who have failed to make real progress on race or the environment

headline: Alberta tipped for Tory landslide amid resentment over Trudeau's oil policy
trailText: With the province’s economy still sluggish the climate crisis seems to be a secondary issue for voters in Canada’s federal election

headline: #WhatsYourExcuse: Canadian teen with terminal cancer urges others to vote
trailText: Maddison Yetman, 18, tells Canadians on video that despite her ‘limited time’, she managed to cast ballot in the federal election

headline: Canada election: can Trudeau excite young voters let down by broken promises?
trailText: Four years on, frustration and apathy could alienate young people in a campaign marked by sniping, absence of bold policy and the blackface scandal

headline: Justin Trudeau is a fake progressive. Now Canada must vote for real ones
trailText: Ahead of Monday’s election, little divides the Liberal prime minister and the reactionary Conservatives. But there is an alternative, says journalist and author Martin Lukacs

headline: Tight Canada election may offer power-broker role to smaller parties
trailText: Forty days of campaigning may have knocked the shine off Justin Trudeau but no party appears likely to capture a majority

headline: Justin Trudeau's victory is a death knell for Canada's fledgling far-right
trailText: Canada’s 43rd election campaign capped a particularly bruising year for Trudeau, but in the end his right-leaning rivals fared worse

headline: Canada election 2019: 'We'll govern for everyone' says Trudeau, after narrow win – as it happened
trailText: Liberal Party holds on to power in Canadian federal election, but loses majority

headline: Canada elections: Trudeau wins narrow victory to form minority government
trailText: Liberals succeed despite lingering criticism over handling of corruption inquiry and blackface scandalCanada election – as it happened

headline: The Guardian view on the Canadian election: a win for Trudeau, but not a triumph
trailText: Editorial: The prime minister did himself more damage in this contest than his opponent. While Justin Trudeau’s defeat of the Conservatives is welcome, closer scrutiny of his record is overdue

headline: Trudeau faces rough road as Canada's minority parties lay out their conditions
trailText: PM faces landscape that will require skill to pass legislation – and rivals who could unseat his government on a whim

headline: Who will be the world's next superpower? Inside the 25 October Guardian Weekly
trailText: This week in our international news magazine, we ask who will be the 21st century’s global superpower. Plus! Trudeau, Brexit and a wave of global protests
